question_text: Before we begin, please read and agree to the following terms and conditions: I understand that the information collected by Ifop and its client(s) will be used for research purposes only. All information will be analyzed with responses from others and no personally identifying information will be reported. I also agree to carefully read and answer each question. I understand that if it is shown I sped through and/or did not carefully read the questions, I may lose my opportunity to complete the survey.

possible_answers.1: I understand and give my consent to these uses and conditions
possible_answers.2: I do NOT give my consent

question_text: Below are some reasons one may purchase fine jewelry. Please choose the ones that are most relevant to you.

sub_questions.question_text: To express my creativity / To show off my individuality
To make a truly unforgettable impression
To exude timeless elegance, refinement, and subtlety
To feel energized, vibrant / To boost my mood
To look high class / To project status
To stand out / To be admired by others
To look sexy / To feel more attractive
To feel like I'm in the know, ahead of trend / To be stylish
To be more respected, taken seriously
To have a good professional image
To have a versatile piece that can be worn for any occasion / in many different ways
To add a final touch whenever I get dressed up
To << fit in >> with my social group
To feel like a better version of myself
It's an heirloom investment piece that will last for generations
It's an attractive investment piece that I can sell later at a higher price
To treat myself / To reward myself
To create my signature look / To elevate my style

It is a brand for people like me

question_text: Everyone has different goals in life. What are the most important things in your life?

To maintain meaningful and lasting friendships

To be more influential and powerful

To continuously grow, learn, and improve myself

To earn prestige and social standing
To be at peace with myself
To explore the world / To experience new cultures

To be free from social pressure
To enjoy life to the fullest
